Ruby.en: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

Sapphire.en: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

Emerald.en: Attacks the foe by firing 2 to 5 icicles in a row.

FireRed.en: Sharp icicles are fired at the foe. It strikes two to five times.

LeafGreen.en: Sharp icicles are fired at the foe. It strikes two to five times.

Diamond.en: The user launches sharp icicles at the foe. It strikes two to five times in a row.
Diamond.de: Feuert zwei bis fünf Eiszapfen auf den Gegner.
